#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string s;
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--) {
		cin>>s; int i=0; bool flag=false;
		while(s[i]) {
			if(s[i]=='a'||s[i]=='e'||s[i]=='i'||s[i]=='o'||s[i]=='u') {
				flag=true;
				break;
			}
			i++;
		}
		if(flag)
			cout<<"yes\n";
		else
			cout<<"no\n";
	}
}
